summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5834 for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from a connection with Lake Washington Boulevard South, south of Holgate Street, to the north line of Yesler Way produced easterly; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76920 as amended by Ordinance No. 77866, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
